channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PA

item.title: Report X-2025050671
item.description:
Report X-2025050671

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-07
  • City: PHILADELPHIA
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Hazmats came back on truck. Another QA admin and I placed damaged hazmats in hazmat bin and placed them in hazmat cage. After packing damages into hazmat bin the other QA admin took glove off using her mouth and later fell ill. The sort manager called 911 for her and she was transported to the hospital for treatment of her condition.
